name: Mural
detailed_description:
You will lead the adventure of the moon you want to become the sun.


*Note:
--An adventure to find the answer.

-Auto save function with a single adventure to help.

-A vocabulary that harmonizes with poor drawing skills.

-There are 32 rooms in total, and every time we go through eight rooms, the way is changed.

-First. Avoid objects and reach your destination.

-Second. Sometimes you need to infer the answer from a conversation.

-Third. Puzzles. Like some prominent professor who lived on Nintendo for example.

-A chimera for the very first time.

-Fourth. Move along the surf-like tiles.

short_description: A trip to find a way for the moon to be the sun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 4 GB RAM
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
